text:
@realDonaldTrump @nytimes Hey Dr Donnie Do-Little

YOU just ADMITTED you knew about Covid-19 virus infection before March 2020

Banning PEOPLE from coming into U.S. did not stop or even SLOW the virus down
Especially since the Covid 19 virus strain in America now came from
EUROPE you racist asshole
